cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 9th Oct 2025 (UTC+08:45) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 9th Oct 2025 (UTC+08:45) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our comfortable shared rooms provide a cozy atmosphere for guests looking to unwind, chill and relax. Each room is equipped with linen, key card locks, fans, and reading lights for your convenience.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Whether you're traveling alone or with a partner, our private room is the perfect place to unwind. Enjoy the comfort of air conditioning and the privacy of your own space. Please note that the maximum number of guests per booking is two.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
